basics.name: Benjamin Kaminow
basics.label: Graduate Student
basics.summary: Graduate student pursuing a PhD in Computational Biology. Currently working on structure-based machine learning methods for predicting protein-ligand binding affinities.

education.institution: Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center and Weill Cornell Medical College

work.name: Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory
work.summary: Worked with Dr. Alex Dobin developing computational methods to construct and analyze consensus genomes.

awards.title: Graduate Research Fellowship Program
awards.summary: The NSF Graduate Research Fellowship Program is a highly competitive fellowship that seeks to support graduate students pursuing research-based degrees in a STEM field.
